Buddha's Footprint

A puddle of water resembling a large footprint was found near {1_City}. It has been declared to be a footprint of the Lord Buddha. Buddhist legend holds that during his lifetime the Buddha flew and left his footprints in all lands where his teachings would be acknowledged. As the mark has been claimed to be a footprint of Buddha, voices have been raised in support of building a temple around it.
Fund the temple.
Perhaps it'd be wise to send men to investigate.
I have no time for such foolish beliefs!

The structure will serve as a testament to our faith!
As one of the Christian faith, I will also contribute to the construction of this edifice.

Marian Apparition

A group of adolescent children, siblings from a small village near [city] confessed to their local priest that they have been visited by none other than the Virgin Mary. They described in detail what the Lady had shown them - visions of Heaven and Hell, prophecies of a great war, and reconcilement of a great nation in Her name. The children insisted that their confessions are meant to remain secret, but the priest decided to share the information with his superiors. What should we do?
We ought to construct a sanctuary in the place to commemorate the miracle.
We must investigate the veracity of this tale first, else our doctrine might suffer.
Dismiss the priest. This is mere folklore.

New Biblical Canon

There is unrest in the clergy. Theologians claim that the Holy Bible needs to undergo changes and rearrangements in order to reflect our faith better. Some of the scholars view several books of the Old Testament to be contradictory to our doctrines, while others question the canonicity of the Apocrypha. A great council has been called to discuss the issue. What change should we endorse?
Remove the Deuterocanonical books from the Old Testament.
Remove the Apocrypha.
Neither of those. The Bible is holy and must not be altered.

Iconoclasm

A recent reinterpretation of the Bible has led a number of bishops and secular officials to believe that icon-making and any kind of portrayal of the divine is against the will of God. To atone for this alleged sin and to protect our empire from divine retribution, they seek to destroy all the icons and holy images throughout the realm. People are taking sides, and the threat of social unrest is growing by the day. We must take action!
Support the iconoclasts and destroy all icons.
Support the iconodules and protect the icon-makers.
Call a Holy Synod and reconcile both parties.
